attributes.action: we're paying too much money to footballers and not enough to soldiers and nurses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: some footballers get paid £500000 a week for kicking a ball where as the average nurse salary is £42,840 a year. for saving our lives. i think that this is grossly unfair and plain greedy. i think that the goverment should set a limit on how much footballers are allowed to get paid.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
